summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganCeraVe Skincare Essentials Travel Size Kit features three essential products, all containing hyaluronic acid, for hydrating and restoring the protective skin barrier.
details: DetailsBenefitsCeraVe Hydrating Facial Cleanser is a unique formula that cleanses, hydrates and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II)CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion has a unique, lightweight formula that provides 24-hour hydration and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1,3,6-II)CeraVe Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum is a refreshing gel-cream formula with 3 essential ceramides, CeraVe's highest concentration of hyaluronic acid, & vitamin B5, and replenishes skin hydration while helping restore the protective skin barrier and improve the appearance of dry linesSuitable for face and body, specifically normal / balanced and dry skinNon-comedogenicFragrance FreeParaben FreeDermatologist RecommendedDeveloped with DermatologistsKey IngredientsAll three products in the kit are formulated with hyaluronic acid to help retain skinâ€™s natural moistureAll three products in the kit contain ceramides that help restore and maintain the skin's natural barrierCeraVe Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum contains Vitamin B5 which helps soothe skinCeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion & CeraVe Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum contain MVE Technology, a patented delivery system, continually releases moisturizing ingredientsIncludesHydrating Facial Cleanser (3.0 oz)Daily Moisturizing Lotion (3.0 oz)Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum (1.0 oz)Item 2620440How To UseHydrating Facial Cleanser: Wet skin with lukewarm water. Massage cleanser into skin in a gentle, circular motion. Rinse.Daily Moisturizing Lotion: Apply liberally as often as needed, or as directed by a physician.Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum: Apply evenly to face and neck daily. Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum can be used alone, or layered under moisturizer. Avoid eye area. If contact with eyes occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.IngredientsHydrating Facial Cleanser: Aqua/Water/Eau Glycerin Cetearyl Alcohol Peg-40 Stearate Stearyl Alcohol Potassium Phosphate Ceramide Np Ceramide Ap Ceramide Eop Carbomer Glyceryl Stearate Behentrimonium Methosulfate Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate Sodium Hyaluronate Cholesterol Phenoxyethanol Disodium Edta Dipotassium Phosphate Tocopherol Phytosphingosine Xanthan Gum Cetyl Alcohol Polysorbate 20 EthylhexylglycerinDaily Moisturizing Lotion: Aqua/Water/Eau Glycerin Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride Cetearyl Alcohol Cetyl Alcohol Potassium Phosphate Ceramide Np Ceramide Ap Ceramide Eop Carbomer Dimethicone Ceteareth-20 Behentrimonium Methosulfate Methylparaben Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate Cholesterol Disodium Edta Dipotassium Phosphate Propylparaben Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid Phytosphingosine Xanthan Gum Polysorbate 20 Polyglyceryl-3 DiisostearateHydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum: Aqua/Water, Glycerin, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Dimethicone, Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Panthenol, Ceramide Np, Ceramide Ap, Ceramide Eop, Carbomer, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cholesterol, Phenoxyethanol, Disodium Edta, Isopropyl Myristate, Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Xanthan Gum, Phytosphingosine, Ethylhexylglycerin.
how_to_use: Hydrating Facial Cleanser: Wet skin with lukewarm water. Massage cleanser into skin in a gentle, circular motion. Rinse.Daily Moisturizing Lotion: Apply liberally as often as needed, or as directed by a physician.Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum: Apply evenly to face and neck daily. Hydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum can be used alone, or layered under moisturizer. Avoid eye area. If contact with eyes occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.
ingredients: Hydrating Facial Cleanser: Aqua/Water/Eau Glycerin Cetearyl Alcohol Peg-40 Stearate Stearyl Alcohol Potassium Phosphate Ceramide Np Ceramide Ap Ceramide Eop Carbomer Glyceryl Stearate Behentrimonium Methosulfate Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate Sodium Hyaluronate Cholesterol Phenoxyethanol Disodium Edta Dipotassium Phosphate Tocopherol Phytosphingosine Xanthan Gum Cetyl Alcohol Polysorbate 20 EthylhexylglycerinDaily Moisturizing Lotion: Aqua/Water/Eau Glycerin Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride Cetearyl Alcohol Cetyl Alcohol Potassium Phosphate Ceramide Np Ceramide Ap Ceramide Eop Carbomer Dimethicone Ceteareth-20 Behentrimonium Methosulfate Methylparaben Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate Cholesterol Disodium Edta Dipotassium Phosphate Propylparaben Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid Phytosphingosine Xanthan Gum Polysorbate 20 Polyglyceryl-3 DiisostearateHydrating Hyaluronic Acid Serum: Aqua/Water

reviews.headline: Defective product
reviews.comments: Unfortunately, the pump for the serum was not working and no product will come out. This is very disappointing, as this product is what makes the set a good deal. Save yourself the money and just buy the cleanser and lotion separately. Maybe I just got a bad batch :(

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: This is a very good travel set for the price
